did.unittitle: Xavier University Department of Criminal Justice records
did.abstract: This is a very small collection of materials pertaining to the Department of Criminal Justice at Xavier University. Materials are undated.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Materials in this collection include program information supplied by the Graduate Services Office, typescript information on the program, and two photocopied documents: "Law and Corrections: Where Does Ohio Go From Here?" and "Let's Correct Correctional Training" by Paul H. Hahn of Xavier University.

arrangement.head: Statement of Arrangement
arrangement.p: Materials are arranged in one folder
